name: Snow Truck Driver Simulator 3D – Drive the big crane and clear up ice from frozen road
name_original: Snow Truck Driver Simulator 3D – Drive the big crane and clear up ice from frozen road
description:
Heavy winter and extreme snowfall caused the road blocks!! Select a heavy machine and take away the snow to clear the roads for traffic. This simulator game is the next level of fun and challenge for driving lovers. In this challenging game you will drive different snow trucks, cranes and excavators. Clear the jammed up roads and steer the mega machines in the realistic hilly road ways. That’s not it 10 challenging levels are waiting for you with extreme and tough tasks to achieve.
In this machine world your imagination is limited. Now drive the heavy machines and have exciting full of fun snowplow services adventure. This simulation game is consisting of career mode where you can drive in rush and provide your services in this realistic 3D environment. To boost up your gaming view multiple camera views are added in it.


Features
• 3 mega machine to select from.
• Multiple challenging missions of hilly area adventure.
• Day and night time game play.
• Realistic full of snow and mountainous environment.
• Lifelike graphics and high quality sounds.
• Smooth controls with user friendly interface.
